name: Hide Prices for WooCommerce
author: WP Geeks

sections.description:
Hiding WooCommerce prices and the add to cart button has never been this easy! With Hide Prices for WooCommerce you can easily hide the prices for a specific products. You are also able to remove and disable the “Add to Cart” button.

Hide Prices for WooCommerce works with both simple products and variable products and takes less than a minute to get up and running. Simply install the plugin and configure the product settings.

Questions? Feel free to contact us and we’d be happy to answer any questions you may have.

Pro Version

Hide Prices Pro builds on the functionality of the free version of the plugin. It adds additional support for:

  • Individual variations – hide the prices and the add to cart button of individual variations of a variable product
  • Replacing a product or variation price with a button and custom URL
  • Replacing a product or variation price with a text label

Get Hide Prices Pro to enable these features.

Usage

Once you have installed the plugin, you will find the settings on the Edit Product page in WooCommerce, under the General tab in the Product Data metabox.
sections.installation:
Installation is simple! Download and add the plugin to your WordPress plugin directory. Once the plugin is uploaded, go to the WordPress Plugins page and activate it.

Once activated, you can go to an individual WooCommerce product settings page to configure the options.

For simple and variable products, you can go to the edit product page and in the “Product Data” meta window, you will now see the configuration options for hiding the product under the “General” tab.
sections.faq:
I’ve enabled the plugin but the prices are still not being hidden

First, make sure that you’ve enabled the correct configuration to hide the product. If everything looks good, there is a slight chance that the theme you are using has a custom way of displaying price data that we’re not able to override. Get in contact with the WP Geeks support team and we will assist in getting the plugin to work with your theme.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Added: Ability to hide prices and the add to cart button on single and variable products

short_description: A plugin for WooCommerce that lets you hide prices for specific products as well as hide the add to cart button.
